161  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //

176 
178  struct HingeJointComponent {
179 
180  bool isLimitEnabled;
181  bool isMotorEnabled;
182  decimal lowerLimit;
183  decimal upperLimit;
184  decimal motorSpeed;
185  decimal maxMotorTorque;
186 
188  HingeJointComponent(bool isLimitEnabled, bool isMotorEnabled, decimal lowerLimit, decimal upperLimit,
189  decimal motorSpeed, decimal maxMotorTorque)
190  : isLimitEnabled(isLimitEnabled), isMotorEnabled(isMotorEnabled), lowerLimit(lowerLimit), upperLimit(upperLimit),
191  motorSpeed(motorSpeed), maxMotorTorque(maxMotorTorque) {
192 
193  }
194  };
195

416 };
417 
418 // Return a pointer to a given joint
419 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE HingeJoint* HingeJointComponents::getJoint(Entity jointEntity) const {
420 
421  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
422  return mJoints[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
423 }
424 
425 // Set the joint pointer to a given joint
426 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void HingeJointComponents::setJoint(Entity jointEntity, HingeJoint* joint) const {
427 
428  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
429  mJoints[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = joint;
430 }
431 
432 // Return the local anchor point of body 1 for a given joint
433 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Vector3& HingeJointComponents::getLocalAnchorPointBody1(Entity jointEntity) const {
434 
435  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
436  return mLocalAnchorPointBody1[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
437 }
438 
439 // Set the local anchor point of body 1 for a given joint
440 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void HingeJointComponents::setLocalAnchorPointBody1(Entity jointEntity, const Vector3& localAnchoirPointBody1) {
441 
442  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
443  mLocalAnchorPointBody1[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = localAnchoirPointBody1;
444 }
445 
446 // Return the local anchor point of body 2 for a given joint
447 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Vector3& HingeJointComponents::getLocalAnchorPointBody2(Entity jointEntity) const {
448 
449  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
450  return mLocalAnchorPointBody2[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
451 }
452 
453 // Set the local anchor point of body 2 for a given joint
454 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void HingeJointComponents::setLocalAnchorPointBody2(Entity jointEntity, const Vector3& localAnchoirPointBody2) {
455 
456  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
457  mLocalAnchorPointBody2[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = localAnchoirPointBody2;
458 }

460 // Return the vector from center of body 1 to anchor point in world-space
461 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Vector3& HingeJointComponents::getR1World(Entity jointEntity) const {
462 
463  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
464  return mR1World[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
465 }
466 
467 // Set the vector from center of body 1 to anchor point in world-space
468 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void HingeJointComponents::setR1World(Entity jointEntity, const Vector3& r1World) {
469 
470  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
471  mR1World[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = r1World;
472 }

479 }

485  mR2World[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = r2World;
486 }

492  return mI1[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
493 }

730 // Return the inverse of mass matrix K=JM^-1J^t for the limits and motor constraints (1x1 matrix)

732 
733  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
734  return mInverseMassMatrixLimitMotor[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
735 }
736 
737 // Set the inverse of mass matrix K=JM^-1J^t for the limits and motor constraints (1x1 matrix)

739 
740  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
741  mInverseMassMatrixLimitMotor[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = inverseMassMatrixLimitMotor;
742 }
743 
744 // Return the inverse of mass matrix K=JM^-1J^t for the motor
745 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal HingeJointComponents::getInverseMassMatrixMotor(Entity jointEntity) {
746 
747  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
748  return mInverseMassMatrixMotor[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
749 }
750 
751 // Return the inverse of mass matrix K=JM^-1J^t for the motor
752 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void HingeJointComponents::setInverseMassMatrixMotor(Entity jointEntity, decimal inverseMassMatrixMotor) {
753 
754  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
755  mInverseMassMatrixMotor[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = inverseMassMatrixMotor;
756 }
757

760 
761  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
762  return mBLowerLimit[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
763 }
